title: Payload Configuration Document
description: Stores configuration data for one payload including radio transmission information and telemetry format.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a payload_configuration document. Should be set to 'payload_configuration'.

owner.title: Document Owner
owner.description: The CouchDB user who owns this document. If specified, only this logged in user and admins may edit the document.

name.title: Payload Name
name.description: The payload's name. Does not have to be its radio callsign.

time_created.title: Document Creation Date
time_created.description: The date at which this document was created. Used for fetching the latest version of a configuration document. In RFC3339.

transmissions.title: Radio Transmissions
transmissions.description: A list of all the radio formats in use by the payload.

items.title: Radio Transmission Details
items.description: Information on one set of radio settings in use by the payload.

frequency.title: Radio Frequency
frequency.description: The transmission frequency in use, as a number in Hz.

mode.title: Radio Mode
mode.description: The transmission mode in use, as a string, e.g. 'USB' or 'FM'.

modulation.title: Telemetry Modulation
modulation.description: The form of modulation in use, e.g., 'RTTY'.

shift.title: Telemetry Shift
shift.description: Where relevant, the frequency shift used by the telemetry, as a number in Hz.

encoding.title: Telemetry Encoding
encoding.description: Where relevant, the encoding scheme used by the telemetry, as a string, e.g. 'ASCII-8'.

baud.title: Telemetry Baud Rate
baud.description: Where relevant, the baud rate used by the telemetry, as a number.

parity.title: Telemetry Parity
parity.description: Where relevant, the parity used by the telemetry, as a string, e.g. 'none' or 'even'.

stop.title: Telemetry Stop Bits
stop.description: Where relevant, the number of stop bits used by the telemetry, as a number.

description.title: Telemetry Description
description.description: A brief human readable description of this telemetry configuration, just used for UI.

sentences.title: Telemetry Sentences
sentences.description: A list of all the sentence formats in use by the payload.

items.title: Telemetry Sentence Details
items.description: Information on the format of transmitted telemetry.

protocol.title: Sentence Protocol
protocol.description: The protocol in use by this telemetry sentence, as a string, e.g., 'UKHAS'.

checksum.title: Sentence Checksum
checksum.description: Where relevant, the checksum algorithm in use, as a string, e.g., 'crc16-ccitt'.

callsign.title: Payload Callsign
callsign.description: The callsign of the payload. Used to look up what configuration should be used to parse incoming telemetry.

description.title: Sentence Description
description.description: A brief human readable description of this sentence configuration, just used for UI.

fields.title: Sentence Fields
fields.description: The fields this sentence is made up of, as an array, taken in order.

name.title: Field Name
name.description: The name used to identify this field once parsed, as a string, e.g. 'altitude'.

sensor.title: Field Sensor
sensor.description: The sensor module used to parse this field, as a string, e.g. 'base.ascii_int'.

format.title: Field Format
format.description: When required by the sensor, the format to use parsing this field, e.g. 'dd.dddd'.

filters.title: Payload Filters
filters.description: Filters are applied during or after data parsing to help munge data back to how it should be. They're specified here.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Filters
intermediate.description: These filters are applied once raw data has been identified as belonging to this payload, before parsing.

items.title: Filter
items.description: A filter munges data into what it should be. Additional configuration properties may be specified for specific filters.

type.title: Filter Type
type.description: Either 'normal' for standard, pre-written filters, or 'hotfix' for code executed from this document.

callable.title: Callable for Filter
callable.description: For normal filters, this is the path of the function to execute.

code.title: Hotfix Code
code.description: For hotfix filters, this is the code to execute, specified as the body of a function with `data` as the parameter which should be modified and returned.

signature.title: Hotfix Signature
signature.description: For hotfix filters, this is the signature to validate the code. See documentation for more details.

certificate.title: Hotfix Certificate
certificate.description: For hotfix filters, this is the certificate against which the signature should be checked. Given as a string certificate file name.

post.title: Post Filters
post.description: These filters are applied once the sentence has been parsed, and may be used to alter the resulting output data.

items.title: Filter
items.description: A filter munges data into what it should be. Additional configuration properties may be specified for specific filters.

type.title: Filter Type
type.description: Either 'normal' for standard, pre-written filters, or 'hotfix' for code executed from this document.

callable.title: Callable for Filter
callable.description: For normal filters, this is the path of the function to execute.

code.title: Hotfix Code
code.description: For hotfix filters, this is the code to execute, specified as the body of a function with `data` as the parameter which should be modified and returned.

signature.title: Hotfix Signature
signature.description: For hotfix filters, this is the signature to validate the code. See documentation for more details.

certificate.title: Hotfix Certificate
certificate.description: For hotfix filters, this is the certificate against which the signature should be checked. Given as a string certificate file name.

metadata.title: Payload Metadata
metadata.description: Any additional information about the payload.
